SELECT emp.emp_id, emp.emp_name, uo.create_time, uo.order_id, u.user_name, u.user_phone, u.user_idcard, u.user_address, u.user_id, baseinformation.order_payment AS baseOrderPayment, baseinformation.order_gas AS baseOrderGas, launch.order_payment AS launchOrderPayment, launch.order_gas AS launchOrderGas, replacement.order_payment AS replacementOrderPayment, replacement.order_gas AS replacementOrderGas, uc.`card_cost` FROM user_orders uo LEFT JOIN (SELECT order_id, order_payment, order_gas FROM user_orders WHERE usable = 1 AND ( account_state NOT IN (1, 3) OR account_state IS NULL )) AS baseinformation ON uo.order_id = baseinformation.order_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT order_id, order_payment, order_gas FROM user_orders WHERE usable = 1 AND account_state IN (1)) AS launch ON uo.order_id = launch.order_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT order_id, order_payment, order_gas FROM user_orders WHERE usable = 1 AND order_type = 3) AS replacement ON uo.order_id = replacement.order_id LEFT JOIN employee emp ON uo.employee_id = emp.emp_id LEFT JOIN `user` u ON uo.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN user_card uc ON uo.order_id = uc.order_id WHERE emp.usable = 1 AND uo.usable = 1 AND u.usable = 1
AND DATE_FORMAT(uo.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= #{startDate}
AND DATE_FORMAT(uo.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= #{endDate}
AND emp.emp_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{empName}, '%')
AND (uo.account_state NOT IN (1, 3)OR uo.account_state IS NULL)
AND uo.account_state IN (1)
AND uo.order_type = 3
